Operation 'getDealItems' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Added summary describing the action, clarified what inputs are expected, specified the response type, and emphasized the affiliate URL requirement for partner network usage.

data.current_description:
This method retrieves a paginated set of deal items. The result set contains all deal items associated with the specified search criteria and marketplace ID.

Restrictions

This method can return a maximum of 10,000 items. For a list of supported sites and other restrictions, see API Restrictions.

eBay Partner Network: In order to receive a commission for your sales, you must use the URL returned in the itemAffiliateWebUrl field to forward your buyer to the ebay.com site.
data.summary_suggestion: Search and retrieve paginated deal items
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated set of deal items matching the specified search criteria for a given marketplace. Accepts search parameters to filter results and returns a DealItemSearchResponse containing deal items with details such as pricing, images, and affiliate URLs. Maximum 10,000 items per request. Use the itemAffiliateWebUrl field for eBay Partner Network commissions.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (search criteria specifics), expected response structure (DealItemSearchResponse), and actionable guidance for AI agents. Added summary describing the action, clarified what inputs are expected, specified the response type, and emphasized the affiliate URL requirement for partner network usage.

data.current_description:
This method retrieves the details for an eBay event. The result set contains detailed information associated with the specified event ID, such as applicable coupons, start and end dates, and event terms.

Restrictions

This method can return a maximum of 10,000 items. For a list of supported sites and other restrictions, see API Restrictions.

eBay Partner Network: In order to receive a commission for your sales, you must use the URL returned in the itemAffiliateWebUrl field to forward your buyer to the ebay.com site.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve detailed information for a specific event
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves comprehensive details for a specific eBay event by event ID. Returns an Event object containing event metadata including coupons, start/end dates, terms, and associated items. Requires event_id as a path parameter and marketplace specification. Use the itemAffiliateWebUrl field for eBay Partner Network commissions.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description mentions what is returned but lacks clarity on required inputs (event_id parameter), response schema type (Event), and how to use the operation. Added summary with clear action, specified required parameters, identified response type, and clarified affiliate URL usage.

data.current_description:
This method returns paginated results containing all eBay events for the specified marketplace.

Restrictions

This method can return a maximum of 10,000 items. For a list of supported sites and other restrictions, see API Restrictions.

eBay Partner Network: In order to receive a commission for your sales, you must use the URL returned in the itemAffiliateWebUrl field to forward your buyer to the ebay.com site.
data.summary_suggestion: Search and retrieve paginated eBay events
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all eBay events for a specified marketplace. Accepts marketplace ID and pagination parameters to filter results and returns an EventSearchResponse containing Event objects with details such as event dates, terms, and associated coupons. Maximum 10,000 items per request. Use the itemAffiliateWebUrl field for eBay Partner Network commissions.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about input parameters (only mentions marketplace, not pagination options) and response structure (EventSearchResponse). Added summary describing the search action, clarified expected inputs including pagination, specified response type, and emphasized affiliate URL usage for partner network.

data.current_description:
This method returns a paginated set of event items. The result set contains all event items associated with the specified search criteria and marketplace ID.

Restrictions

This method can return a maximum of 10,000 items. For a list of supported sites and other restrictions, see API Restrictions.

eBay Partner Network: In order to receive a commission for your sales, you must use the URL returned in the itemAffiliateWebUrl field to forward your buyer to the ebay.com site.
data.summary_suggestion: Search and retrieve paginated event items
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated set of items associated with eBay events matching the specified search criteria and marketplace. Accepts search parameters and pagination options to filter results and returns an EventItemSearchResponse containing EventItem objects with details such as pricing, images, and affiliate URLs. Maximum 10,000 items per request. Use the itemAffiliateWebUrl field for eBay Partner Network commissions.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks specificity about input parameters (vague 'search criteria'), response structure (EventItemSearchResponse), and what EventItem objects contain. Added summary describing the search action, clarified expected inputs including pagination, specified response type with EventItem details, and emphasized affiliate URL usage.
